This is an ok game, but it did not really age well. Today it is playable and even enjoyable as a shooter. But I was more hoping for the story, which was hardly there and wasn't really interesting.
This game is pretty good.

this game was pretty ground breaking for its time, and i really like that it tells a story only with its environments, there are events you can witness or miss, thus making the world more believable. the ai in this game is really impressive, with some enemies even having a sense of smell mechanic.

though i will say, the level design is a bit dumb in some areas, its very easy to get lost sometimes, some parts feel like a maze.

if you want to see how the half life franchise started, and to see how it grew from its very beginning, play this game. if you want a more modern and polished experience, play the remake, Black Mesa.

这是一部毫无疑问的佳作，先把年份问题抛开，即使用现在的眼光去看它依旧是“不显老”,甚至在故事剧情，细节，氛围营造和关卡设计上具有超前的意义和概念。
1.画面
想啥自行车？
2.怪物设计
故事中的怪物均来源于xen星球，首先就让怪物的概念更加新奇，而又充满未知的恐惧的古怪感，甚至会让你背后有点发凉（说真的，我很怕虫子，这种有点恶心的怪物真的让我后背发凉）它们的身体结构很猎奇，相貌更是不用说，有点像异形的怪物设计呢。
3.关卡设计，地图设计
线性的关卡很简单易懂，没有开阔的场景，唯一有的只有那沾满血的墙，那尸体无数的地板。游戏基本来讲没有视野广的场景，更让场景充满一种未知，超前而又恐惧的氛围，一般来讲玩家经过的只有走廊和通风管道。真的，玩久之后会有一种你被困在一个巨大的铁盒里一样，无法逃脱，你只能在那怪异而又恐怖的走廊里面对一个个的xen星怪物，我们有时候甚至会忘了我们究竟要干什么，就算想起来了，你也只会感叹遥远的路途，希望随之变得不再那么鼓励人心。
3.解密要素和细节
它的解密要素安排巧妙，融入场景，不像玄幻小说里的迷阵那样宏大，半条命的谜题看起来不像是谜题，而是让你周围的非常常见的东西利用起来让你穿过一条条看起来像死路的地方，或者是不可能过去的地方。细节嘛......见啥E就对了！！！！（汽水加一滴血哦）它的作用让游戏看起来生动而又有代入感，这点我非常喜爱。
4.剧情
这个实在是一言难尽，可以去看看B站up的讲解。简单说一下吧，宏伟细致，科幻悬疑，老标签了。具体点就有点像我们俗说的克苏鲁加反乌托邦风格。
其实我们买这个游戏不一定只是单纯想补个票或者是买个情怀什么的，把它当做一个新发售的游戏来玩，它会给你一个你对FPS游戏概念的全新理解。

If you haven't heard of Half Life yet, you must have been living under a rock these past two decades. As expected with a valve game, the detail put into this games graphics for a 90's game is absurd. And if you don't know already, the half life series has one of the best sci-fi stories to offer. IGN in 2005 named Half Life "Best Game of All Time", with its sequel Half Life 2 winning Crispy Gamer's Game of the [b] DECADE [/b] !!!

I've only started getting into Half Life this year, and just thinking about the crazy gameplay in the half life series is so beautiful it almost brings tears to my eyes. This is definitely a must play game for anyone into the FPS genre.

And if you think the first Half Life is good, you [b] NEED [/b] to play Half Life 2! You will not regret it.

Jogo que claramente apresentou um novo caminho para jogos de tiro, ele vai muito além dos campos abertos cheios de soldados e mescla ação, terror e aventura de uma maneira bem peculiar e com sua marca registrada. Ainda assim, alguns trechos são realmente injustos e demandam uma boa concentração do jogador. O final do jogo é algo bem ruim e confuso, mesmo tendo um conceito muito divertido.

Prós:
Liberdade de Gameplay.
Bons Trechos de Parkour.
História que foge dos padrões.
Boa dosagem entre ação e terror.

Contras:
Alguns trechos confusos e difíceis.
Final do jogo é mais frustrante do que interessante.

7/10

I'm sure everyone has heard of Half-life. Being the first game in the series it is a bit different but that doesn't mean its bad. i personally prefer this game over the 2nd games. While its true that its aged poorly in visuals and sound effects, the game holds a charm that no other does. For me this is the most fun to play since its got the best gun play. Many people think that its a run and gun but they couldn't be more wrong. Sure you could run and gun it but you will loose a lot of health. The game encourages you to use your tools and equipment to plan out a course of action, think like a theorist. the enemy you fight are memorable and the AI was amazing for its time while still standing well today. While there is a story there isn't really any focus on it and is really told by the environment. If you want story play the Half-Life 2 games. What ever you do, don't play the source version, its horribly broken and looks off. Play this if you want a good shooter and a fun puzzle game.

The first hour of this game is fantastic, lots of little things happening all around you, the pacing is great and the puzzles are nice however at the second hour of the game it start to get kind of stale with lots of generic enemies and annoying map layouts. the last hour of the game is unplayable, tons of tedious puzzles, never ending waves of overpowered enemies oh and of course game breaking bugs. I kinda thought a game as important as half life would be better than this.

ИСПРАВИЛ ВСЁ ТАКИ ДЕЛАЕМ ТАК:

Бывает так, что автоконнект прописан особо глубоко.. Топаем в папку контры, далее в valve, далее в hw. Там много конфигов. У меня зараза прописалась в geforce.cfg и дописала конфиг в opengl.cfg. geforce.cfg восстановил с нормальной сборки, opengl.cfg просто почистил и на оба (а потом и на все) конфига поставил только чтение. Реконнект исчез:) Таким образом удалось избавиться от коннектов на нечестные сервера.. Мира всем)))

Il gioco che ha dato il via ad una saga e alle fortune di Valve.

Azione rapida e immediata, taglio cinematografico e immersivo, grafica (almeno per il periodo in cui uscì) di prim'ordine, doppiaggio in italiano (un po' ridicolo, ma al tempo non si poteva contare su professionisti a livello di quelli del cinema).

Quel che si suol dire un CLASSICO che, giocato oggi, magari mostra dal punto di vista tecnico i propri limiti, ma è ancora molto giocabile.

Il pack di texture in alta definizione, secondo me, rende molto di più della versione "Source" uscita con Half Life 2.

Half Life ist wahrscheinlich älter als nicht wenige Nutzer auf Steam. Half Life ist ein Stück Videospielgeschichte und hatte einen unglaublichen Einfluss auf so gut wie alle Shooter, die nach Half Life kamen. Und Half Life macht auch 2020 noch richtig viel Spaß.

Ja, die Grafik ist nicht mehr auf dem neuesten Stand. Dies stört überraschenderweise aber gar nicht einmal besonders und bereits nach kurzer Zeit hat man sich daran gewöhnt. Die Spielmechanik ist hingegen überraschend gut - deutlich besser als man dies von einem mehr 20 Jahre alten Spiel erwarten würde.

Die Story und Spielwelt reißen einen auch ohne große Dialoge wirklich mit - ein Kunststück, das bis heute nur wenigen Spielen gelungen ist.

Alles in allem eine ganz klare Empfehlung: Wer Half Life nicht gespielt hat, der hat etwas verpasst.
